channel.title: Video Editor
channel.description:
Does anyone know about any programs that let you add special effects into the video? (I'm not talking about Windows Movie Editer... or any program that lowers the contrast or crappy things like that, I'm talking about a program that adds in objects and lights and stuff.)
You know like in that new iPod nano advert.. the one where they draw with there iPods? And video edits like the ones done to star wars kid?

item.title: Video Editor
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

I’ll try that then.

Read full topic
